Customs & Duties International buyers will be responsible for any and all customs, duties taxes and brokerage fees to be paid to the courier or government. Terms of Sale All sales are final and we expect payment within 5 working days. We offer a 14 day refund policy for items as long as they are received back in the original condition they were shipped in with all original packaging and they have not been tampered with. We reserve the right to place restrictions on payment terms for items shipped to certain international destinations, such as ones where there is a high risk of fraud. Return Policies• All purchases are eligible for a refund or an exchange within 30 days upon receipt.• All product returns require the buyer to contact us before returning the item.• All refunds will be processed within 5 business days upon receipt of the returned item.• All buyers are responsible for return shipping costs unless the item is damaged or defective.• All returns must be in the same condition to which were they received and must include all items. FeedbackWe value our feedback as we believe it says alot about how we look after customers. We always leave feedback for our customers after we have received feedback ourselves for an item, as this lets us know that the item purchased has been received and that the customer is happy with it.
